import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import "./style.css"; import * as evalueteApi from "../apis/evaluete"; export default function Index(props) { const [list, setList] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { evalueteApi.getEvaluete(props.product.masanpham) .then((success) => { if (success.status===200) { setList(success.data.value.$values); console.log(success.data.value.$values) } }) .catch((error)=>{ console.error(error); }) }, [props.product.masanpham]) return (

{ (()=>{ const sum = list.reduce((a, b) => a.sosao + b.sosao, 0); console.log(sum); return sum/list.length ||0; })() }/5
